description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Get behind the throttle of a fast paced space fighter as a gun for hire at Lancer Corp.  Unlock missions and buy ships with newly acquired credits as you find out more and more how the universe isn't so friendly.
description.short: Get behind the throttle of a fast paced space fighter as a gun for hire at Lancer Corp.  Unlock missions and buy ships with newly acquired credits as you find out more and more how the universe isn't so friendly.
